propagations.condition: failure in exporting metrics and scraping data
failure in exporting metrics and scraping data

remediation.action: Check the current configuration of the `otel-demo-loadgenerator` to ensure it is generating sufficient traffic.
Increase the memory limit for the `otel-demo-loadgenerator` deployment to 2Gi to prevent `OOMKilled` errors.
Increase the memory request for the `otel-demo-loadgenerator` deployment to 2Gi to match the new limit.
Redeploy the updated configuration and monitor the pod status.
Check if the Jaeger service is deployed in the environment.
If not deployed, deploy the Jaeger service.
If deployed, verify the configuration to ensure it is correctly set up to retrieve trace data.
Check the configuration of the `otel-demo-otelcol` to ensure it is correctly exporting metrics and scraping data.
If there are misconfigurations, update the settings to ensure proper data export and scraping.
